price: Kur’an okuduğun zaman, kovulmuş Şeytan'dan Allah’a sığın.
arabic: فَإِذَا قَرَأۡتَ ٱلۡقُرۡءَانَ فَٱسۡتَعِذۡ بِٱللَّهِ مِنَ ٱلشَّيۡطَٰنِ ٱلرَّجِيمِ

version.title: Turkish translation - Rowwad Tanslation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Turkish by Rowwad Translation Center in cooperation with Islamhouse.com in 1440 H.

meta.transliteration: fa-idhā qarata al-qur'āna fa-is'taʿidh bil-lahi mina al-shayṭāni al-rajīmi
